member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.Cmd
member.summary: Any commands set in libraries need to use this as the delegate type.
member.param: The array of parameters for the command.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.CommandStackHook
member.summary: This is the hook delegate type required to hook to the command stack.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.variableDictionaryHook
member.summary: This is the hook delegate type required to hook to the variable Dictionary.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.ProgramEventHook
member.summary: This is the hook delegate used for the start and stop program hook events.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.PreCommandExecuteHook
member.summary: This is the hook used for the preexecute command hook event.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.PostCommandExecuteHook
member.summary: This is the hook used for the postexecute command hook event.
member.param: The return string from the command.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.FormHook
member.summary: This hook is used to access and modify the main form.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.OutputTextBoxHook
member.summary: This hook is used to access the output box on the main form.
member.param: The output textbox on the form.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.SyntaxNameHook
member.summary: This hook is used to access the reference to the syntax name string.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.RunCommandHook
member.summary: This hook is used to run a command, and can be invoked by the library once an instance is retrieved via the GetRunCommandHook.
member.returns: The return value of the command.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.GetRunCommandHook
member.summary: Gets the hook instance for RunCommandHook so it can be invoked by the library.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.WriteOutputHook
member.summary: This hook is used to write to the output textbox, and can be invoked by the library once an instance is retrieved via the GetWriteOutputHook.
member.param: The string to write to the output textbox.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.GetWriteOutputHook
member.summary: Gets the hook instance for WriteOutputHook so it can be invoked by the library.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.ReadOutputHook
member.summary: This hook is used to read from the output textbox, and can be invoked by the library once an instance is retrieved via the GetWriteOutputHook.
member.returns: The contents of the output textbox.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.Types.GetReadOutputHook
member.summary: Gets the hook instance for ReadOutputHook so it can be invoked by the library.

member.name: M:captainalm.calmcon.api.ISyntax.name
member.summary: Returns the Syntax Name.

member.name: M:captainalm.calmcon.api.ISyntax.decrypt(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Defines the required command decryptor, the returned list has the command as the first item and the arguments as the other items.
member.param: This is where the command string is passed.
This is where the list of commands on the console is passed.
member.returns: The returned list has the command as the first item and the arguments as the other items.

member.name: T:captainalm.calmcon.api.ISyntax
member.summary: API interface for adding other syntax language interpreters.
